attributes.action: Declare an Ecological Emergency based on the UN report on biodiversity loss.
attributes.background: The UN report on the state of the natural world points to serious levels of biodiversity loss and the risk of extinction both to 1 million species as well as humanity. We need to restore nature.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do by declaring an ecological emergency. 

You might also want to sign this petition on restoring nature:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254607
